        public Layer fit(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext sc,
        org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.LabeledPoint> rdd)
        Fit the given rdd given the context. This will convert the labeled points to the internal dl4j format and train the model on that
        Parameters:
        sc - the org.deeplearning4j.spark context
        rdd - the rdd to fitDataSet
        Returns:
        the multi layer network that was fitDataSet
